text:
54
Imports of Timber, &c.
LONDON.
(From May 29th to June 12th.)
May 29th. Flink @ Fredrikstad,—3,423 pcs. battens, 44,261 pcs. planed boards, Brieseman & Co. Amalie @ Belize,—38 fantails, 491 pcs. mahogany, 85 t. logwood, 20 t. rosewood, Young, Harrison & Co. Evelyn @ Colombo,—24 logs ebony, 106 pcs. sapan wood, Order. Verona @ Tuticorin,—63 logs ebony, 1,786 pcs. sapan wood, Order. Denmark (s) @ New York,—45 logs satinwood, 4,320 staves, Order.
June 1st. Tweed (s) @ Cronstadt,—1,350 pcs. lathwood, C. Matvieff & Co. Mary (s) @ Gothenburg,—3,273 pcs. deals, W. Shaw & Son ; 200 bales wood pulp, Benecke Bros. ; 288 bdls. lathwood, Order. Evening Star @ West Indies,—174 t. mahogany, 13 1/2 t. brazilletto wood, J. Thomson ; 13 logs mahogany, 60 t. logwood, 6 t. fustic, T. Bonar & Co. Helen @ Hobart Town,—5,506 treenails, Order. Empress (s) @ Venice,—1,802 walnut planks, 1,995 pcs. walnut wood, Order. Quail (s) @ Jamaica,—18 1/2 t. logwood, 8 1/2 t. fustic, Isaac, Sons, & Co. ; 1 1/2 t. logwood, Cottam & Co. Ontario @ New York,—37 logs maple, Farnworth & Jardine ; 1,000 oars, 3,600 staves, Order. Quito (s) @ Cronstadt,—4,954 pcs. lathwood, Reynolds & Sons ; 1,043 deals, 100 deal ends, 509 pcs. 49 fantails mahogany, 250 t. logwood, British Honduras Co. Medelpad @ Minatitlan,—392 logs mahogany, 40 log ends, J. Graham & Co.
June 2nd. Emulation @ Colombo,—3,023 pcs. sapanwood, Order. Cornelia Maria @ Trieste,—113,900 pcs. staves, Order. Luchina @ Genoa,—51,500 butts, 48,840 forends, 10,000 musket stocks, 1,050 planks walnut wood, Order. Enigkeit @ Danzig,—9,000 pcs. staves, Churchill & Sim ; 1,168 pcs. sleepers, Order. Nordkyn @ Savannah,—3 masts, 368 pcs. timber, 348 pcs. timber, 82 pcs. deals, Order. Cornhill @ Jamaica, 252 t. logwood, 150 t. fustic, Order. Olivet @ Fremantle, W.A.,—8 pkgs. timber, J. T. Hosker ; 320 logs sandalwood, Dalgety & Co.
June 3rd. Pansy @ Riga,—6,335 pcs. lathwood, A. H. Langford. Albert Edward (s) @ Gothenburg,—60 prs. oars, 12 doz. rickers, Order. Stephenson (s) @ Cronstadt,—1,345 deals, 2,500 pcs. lathwood, Order. Industry @ Norrkoping,—4,287 pcs. deals and battens, Order. Venus (s) @ Memel, 8,569 deals, Order. Long (s) Ditton @ Riga.—6,870 sleepers, 595 half-sleepers, Order.
June 4th. Deodata @ Gefle,—939 doz. battens, Order. Kung Ring (s) @ Gothenburg,—46 fms. firewood, &c., Duus, Brown & Co. ; 775 doz. battens, 1,143 doors, Order. Harmonie @ Skutskar,—7,239 doz. deals and battens, Order. Jubilee (s) @ Riga,—8,353 sleepers, 574 half-sleepers, Order. Bagna @ Christiania,—2,089 pcs. spars, poles, and boards, R. Ward & Sons. Louisa Ann @ Belize,—4 fantails, 343 pcs. mahogany, 240 t. logwood, British Honduras Co.
June 5th. Nautilus (s) @ Stockholm,—2,598 pkgs. woodware, H. Atkinson. Anna @ Memel,—997 pcs. timber, 48 pcs. ends, T. Gabriel & Sons ; 7,211 oak staves, Order. J. Knight, 997 pcs. lathwood, Order. America @ Sault-au-Mouton,—134 pickets, Order. ——— @ Quebec,—1,914 deals, 14,877 deals and ends, 850 pipe staves, Order.
June 6th. Susanne @ Kotka,—11,347 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, R. Ward & Sons. Louisa Ann Fanny (s) @ Gothenburg,—4,554 bdls. boards, 1,156 logs lathwood, Order.
June 8th. Stretna (s) @ St. Petersburg,—7 fms. firewood, J. Kidmar ; 2,750 pcs. lathwood, Order. Albion @ Christiania,—15,267 boards, With, Webster, & Co. ; 7,473 boards, 624 deals, G. E. Arnold & Co. ; 9,717 boards, 50 cs. 102 bags wood pulp, Order. Frans Henri Kor Kron @ Pensacola,—530 pcs. hewn, 100 pcs. sawn timber, 442 deals, Crow, Bogart & Co. Avona @ Colombo,—93 logs ebony, J. Hadden. Alnwick Castle @ Bombay,—41 logs ebony, Order. Orestes @ Uddevalla,—398 bdls. mouldings, 300 pcs. match-boards, Esdaile & Co. Una (s) @ Sundsund (s) @ Riga, 7 fms. lathwood, Order.
June 9th. Norden (s) @ Konigsberg,—9,690 square sleepers, Order. Naomi @ Singapore,—11,827 pcs. sapanwood, Order. Olivia @ Belize,—141 bdls. hoops, D. Magnus. Josephine @ Memel,—4,518 deals, 32 logs ebony, Order. Soderhamn, 13,000 deals and battens, 1,218 staves, Order. Xulla @ Christianstadt,—4,116 pcs. battens, 11,146 pcs. deals, 400 doz. handspikes, 1,660 treenails, C. A. Levy. Sieveking & Co. Ironside @ Sidney, Veritas @ Ljusne,—193 fms firewood, Order.
June 11th. Carnarvon Castle @ New York,—1,000 oars, Order. Niord @ Soderhamn,—745 1/2 dozen deals and battens, Order. Carl xv. (s) @ Gothenburg,—15 fms. firewood, With & Co. ; 62 prs. oars, 50 std. battens, Order. Jacob Christiansen @ Fredrikstadt,—1830 deals and battens, 77,153 boards, 18 fms. firewood, Tagart & Co.
There were also imported during the same period,—21,399 from the United States, 162 t. logwood, 16 t. and 2,132 pcs. sapan wood, 1,500 rickors, 2 1/2 t. fustic, 500 oars, 4 logs mahogany and 30 cedar planks.

THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL. JUNE 13, 1874.
LIVERPOOL.
May 28th. Immanuel @ Stockholm,—143,439 pcs. palings, 300 pcs. battens, &c., Order. Margaretha Blanea @ Danzig,—895 pcs. timber, 22 fms. lathwood, Order. Anna @ Danzig, 178 pcs. timber, 296 pcs. planks, 1,995 pcs. lathwood, Order. Veritas @ Danzig,—993 pcs. timber, 98 pcs. sleepers, 1,652 pcs. lathwood, Order. Friedrich Gelpeke @ Danzig,—1,250 pcs. timber, 10 fms. lathwood, Order. Friedrich Wilhelm Jebel @ Danzig,—680 pcs. timber, 15 fm s lathwood, Order. rickshald @ Pensacola,—1,386 pcs. timber, 398 pcs. planks, Sundry Consignees. Alf @ Pensacola,—369 pcs. timber, 992 pcs. deals, Order. Darchy Konig (s) @ Riga,—20 fms. lathwood, 500 pcs. sleepers, 13,478 pcs. 1/2-sleepers, Order. Fraternitas @ Baltimore,—378 logs timber, 19,117 pcs. staves, Order.
May 29th. Nueva Dolores @ Manzanilla,—117 pcs. mahogany, 18 pcs. cedar, 1,503 spars, Sundry Consignees. Harvest Queen @ New York,—32 logs maple, 1,130 pcs. timber, W. Cliff. City of Richmond @ St. John, N.B.,—25,728 pcs. deals, 1,148 pcs. deal ends, 10,040 pcs. palings, 2,100 staves. ——— @ Quebec, 4,072 boards, 348 pcs. timber, 243 pcs. deals, Crow & Co. ——— @ Boston,—182 pcs. lignum vitæ, 69 logs mahogany, 426 pcs. timber, 25,208 pcs. deals, &c., Sundry Consignees.
May 30th. ——— @ Baltimore,—24,525 treenails. Christabel @ Jamaica, 15 t. fustic, 1 t. logwood, Gladstone & Co. Eva @ Pensacola,—474 pcs. timber, 728 pcs. deals, 436 pcs. deals, 600 pcs. staves, 8 pcs. deals, &c., Farnworth & Co. ——— @ St. George, N.B., 27,016 pcs. deals, &c., Farnworth & Co.
May 31st. ——— (s) @ Africa,—1,340 pcs. ebony. Mindon @ Pensacola,—1,340 pcs. timber, 490 deals, Crow & Co. Trafalgar @ Pensacola,—1,150 pcs. timber, 507 pcs. planks, Order. Savanilla,—140 pcs. fustic, Potter Bros. Illi-Pool Scar @ Pensacola,—648 pcs. timber, 370 pcs. deals, Bland & Co. Braats @ Pensacola,—395 deals, Order. Mathilde @ Barranquilla,—30 logs wood. Pennsylvania (s) @ Philadelphia,—24,500 staves, Bland & Co. Brest (s) @ Trieste,—30,000 staves, Order. A. and E. Lovett @ Pensacola,—1,084 pcs. timber, 537 pcs. deals, Order.
June 1st. Glenesk @ Buenventura (s) @ Memel,—2,664 deals, 164 pcs. timber, Laurens & Co. Go-ahead @ Danzig,—1,250 pcs. timber, 453 deals, Order. Lady Dufferin @ St. John, N.B.,—34,456 deals, &c., 4,437 pcs. ends, 15,000 palings, John H. Kimball @ St. John, N.B.—28,650 scantlings, 2,602 deal ends, 16,950 palings, Lion @ St. John, N.B.,—32,703 pcs. deals, palings, Order. Seliea @ Rangoon,—168 pcs. scantlings, 10,167 pcs. boards, 3,974 pcs. Agra @ San Francisco,—15,000 ft. boards.
June 2nd. James Phoenix @ Savannah,—2,588 staves, 164 hickory billets, Order. Belle of the Niger @ Tabasco,—329 logs mahogany, 179 log ends, 19 t. logwood, Graham & Co. Laurens @ Norfolk,—4,300 pcs. staves, 1,120 treenails, Order. Friedrich Hassellman @ St. John, N.B.,—24,889 pcs. deals, 2,343 pcs. scantling, 5,824 pcs. ends, 1,627 pcs. boards, Farnworth & Co. Derby @ Hawtelspan,—277 logs mahogany, 16 t. fustic, 331 t. 6 c. logwood & 29 log ends, Graham & Co. Quito @ Jamaica, 12 t. fustic, 1 t. logwood, J. M. Ross & Co. Nordcap @ Belize,—4 fantails, 343 pcs. mahogany, 240 t. logwood, British Honduras Co.
June 3rd. Joseph M. Prussian (s) @ Montreal,—10,000 pcs. palings, Guy & Co. Teibo @ Pensacola,—8,763 logs fustic, Durant & Co. Themis @ St. John, N.B.,—10,000 pcs. palings, Guy & Co.
June 4th. Samaria (s) @ New Orleans,—1,200 staves, 369 pcs. timber, 992 pcs. deals, Sundry Consignees. Argo @ Pensacola,—521 pcs. timber, 393 pcs. deals, Harrison & Co. Go-ahead @ Danzig,—1,250 pcs. timber, 453 deals, Order. Lady Dufferin @ St. John, N.B.,—34,456 deals, &c., 4,437 pcs. ends, 15,000 palings, John H. Kimball @ St. John, N.B.—28,650 scantlings, 2,602 deal ends, 16,950 palings, Lion @ St. John, N.B.,—32,703 pcs. deals, palings, Order. Seliea @ Rangoon,—168 pcs. scantlings, 10,167 pcs. boards, 3,974 pcs. Agra @ San Francisco,—15,000 ft. boards.
June 5th. Gracia (s) @ Black River,—36 c. fustic, 27 t. logwood, Gladstone & Co. Eva @ Pensacola,—452 logs timber, 728 pcs. deals, wood, Order. Charles @ St. George, N.B., 27,016 pcs. deals, &c., Order. W. G. Hatfield @ St. George, N.B., 27,016 pcs. deals, &c., 2,210 pcs. deal ends, Farnworth & Co.
June 6th. Roquelle (s) @ Africa,—1,340 pcs. ebony. Mindon @ Pensacola,—600 pcs. timber, 490 deals, Crow & Co. Trafalgar @ Pensacola,—1,150 pcs. timber, 507 pcs. planks, Order.
June 8th. Engelina @ Savanilla,—140 pcs. fustic, Potter Bros. Illi-nois (s) @ Philadelphia,—24,500 treenails, Pool Scar @ Pensacola,—648 pcs. timber, 370 pcs. deals, Bland & Co. Braats @ Pensacola,—395 deals, Order. Formose @ Pensacola,—1,543 pcs. timber, 383 pcs. deals, &c., Order.
June 9th. A. and E. Lovett @ Pensacola,—1,084 pcs. timber, 537 pcs. deals, Order.
June 10th. Carmeneila @ Cienfuegos,—26 logs sabica wood, 241 logs, 12 log ends mahogany, Sundry Consignees. Voorint @ Curacao, —15 t. fustic, 15 t. lignum vitæ, Duranty & Co. Ariel @ Manzanilla, de Cuba,—35 logs sabica wood, 241 logs mahogany, Sundry Consignees. —376 pcs. 8 fantails mahogany, 100 t. logwood, Young & Co. Able @ Pensacola,—365 pcs. timber, 602 pcs. deals, Order.
There were also imported between the above dates,—66,687 staves from the United States, 70 planks, and 35 pcs. timber from Rangoon and 3 t. sapanwood.
HULL.
May 28th. Schwan (s) @ Bremen,—80 bgs. wood pulp, Veltmann.
